Title: Gotham Men's Silver-Tone 17 Jewel Mechanical Covered Pocket Watch # GWC14036SG
Description: Gotham Men's Silver-Tone 17 Jewel Mechanical Covered Pocket Watch # GWC14036SG FEATURES Classic and elegant silver-tone Roman numeral design exhibition covered pocket watch Intricately designed front cover opens to expose beautiful silver Roman numeral dial with gold tone exhibition center to display movement and it's moving parts Rich antique style blue cobalt hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment Arrives with deluxe draw string pouch and gift box, Selvyt polishing cloth, operating instructions and lifetime limited warranty card DESCRIPTION This classic design brass silver-tone pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect gift or addition to any pocket watch enthusiasts collection. Features include a precision 17 jewel mechanical hand wind skeleton movement, polished silver tone case with an exhibition cover and roman numeral design, blue cobalt hand with luminous interiors and a 14" curb chain with spring ring. As always, your watch will arrive in a deluxe gift box and include our hassle free lifetime limited warranty.
